ProductInfo.Features:
Condroid X7 Allwinner A23 Dual Core 1.5GHz make your Tablet PC run fast, Big screen Tablet 7" 800*480.
8GB Flash storage (expandable to 32GB with micro SD card!). 512MB RAM (DDR3). USB Extendable (Flash Drives/HDD/External Keyboard/3G)
Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) keeps you connected on the go. Front-facing camera makes it easy to chat with friends and family, while rear-facing camera allows you to capture the special moments and upload them to facebook and twitter
Google GMS Certificated you can get free software from Google Play Store. Save you more than 200 dollars per year.
High Capacity 2800mAh Rechargeable Lithium battery, Up to 4 hours battery life
